compliant.section: This policy mentions "the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)" and acknowledges its relevance.
compliant.legal provisions: This is good practice, as per Article 24, but not a specific requirement of the GDPR.

compliant.section: The policy lists the types of personal data collected.
compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR requires data controllers to provide information about the categories of personal data processed (Article 13 & 14).

compliant.section: The policy lists the purposes for which personal data is collected and used.
compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR requires data controllers to provide information about the purposes of the processing (Article 13 & 14).

compliant.section: The policy mentions obtaining consent for personal data collection.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent is one of the legal bases for processing (Article 6), and the GDPR sets out specific requirements for obtaining valid consent (Article 7).

compliant.section: For the collection, processing and use the personal data, we continuously monitor and manage by the principle of not exceeding the specific purpose and not making secondary purpose.

If we engage a third-party supplier to process the Personal Data, the Processor will be subject to binding contractual obligations to: l only process the personal data in accordance with the purpose of our prior written instructions; and l establish mechanism to protect the security of personal data in compliance with requirements under applicable law and regulations.
compliant.legal provisions: Data processing agreements and security obligations for processors

compliant.section: We will do our best to take reasonable measure to protect the security of your personal data (including but not limited to equipment security management and data security auditing mechanism, such as encryption mechanism, firewall etc).

With respect to personal data, you have the right to claim/request under the legally premise: (1) Refuse to provide your personal data: However, if you choose not to provide your personal data, we may not be able to completely provide the relevant functions or services of our website.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to withdraw consent and restrictions on processing

compliant.section: The right to withdraw your consent: Withdraw your consent will not affect the legality of processing your personal data by Wiwynn on the basis of your previous consent.

compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten') and right to restriction of processing
Right of access by the data subject

compliant.section: (6) Request for supplement, correction or deletion .

(8) If You are the residents of the European Economic Area from within the European Union, based on the GDPR, you have the right to claim/request for restriction of processing and, to the extent possible, the right to request for transfer your personal data in an organized, generally usable or machine-readable form .
compliant.legal provisions: Right to restriction of processing, Right to data portability

compliant.section: (2) If we transmit your personal data from within the EU to outside the European Economic Area, and the country where the recipient is has not been certified by the EU for adequacy, we will sign EU standard clauses with the recipient to protect your rights of personal data .
The session cookies are permanently lost when the browser closes.
compliant.legal provisions: Requirement for consent to store cookies on user's device - Session cookies are exempt as they are temporary and deleted when the browser closes.

compliant.section: In the event of a personal data incident that results in a breach of your rights, we will immediately process and investigate the incident and notify you in an appropriate manner once it is identified.
compliant.legal provisions: Notification of a personal data breach to the supervisory authority and data subject - Controllers are obligated to report data breaches to both the supervisory authority and affected individuals.

non_compliant.section: The policy does not explicitly state the legal basis for each processing purpose.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR requires data controllers to identify the legal basis for processing and to inform data subjects of this basis (Articles 6, 13, & 14).
non_compliant.amend: For each purpose listed under "Purpose of Personal Data Collection/Use," specify the legal basis for processing (e.g., consent, contract performance, legal obligation, legitimate interests).

non_compliant.section: The policy does not mention data subject rights.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR grants data subjects various rights, including the right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, and data portability (Articles 12-23). The policy should clearly explain these rights.
non_compliant.amend: Add a section detailing the rights of data subjects under the GDPR, including how they can exercise these rights.

non_compliant.section: The policy does not mention data retention periods.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR requires data to be kept for no longer than necessary for the purposes for which it was processed (Article 5(1)(e)).
non_compliant.amend: Specify the retention periods for each category of personal data or explain how these periods are determined.

non_compliant.section: The policy does not mention data transfers outside the European Economic Area (EEA).
non_compliant.legal provisions: If Wiwynn transfers personal data outside the EEA, the policy must address this and explain the safeguards in place to protect the data (Articles 44-50).
non_compliant.amend: If applicable, add a section explaining the circumstances under which personal data may be transferred outside the EEA and the safeguards in place to ensure an adequate level of protection.

non_compliant.section: The policy does not mention the contact details of the data protection officer (DPO), if one has been appointed.
non_compliant.legal provisions: If a DPO is required or has been appointed, the policy should provide their contact details (Articles 37-39).
non_compliant.amend: If applicable, provide the contact details of the DPO.

non_compliant.section: Unless otherwise agreed, we will retain the personal data within 5 years in principle or the period in accordance with the extinction of specific purpose for collection or the expiration of agreement term (the longer period will prevail).
non_compliant.legal provisions: Storage limitation
non_compliant.amend: Specify a clear and lawful basis for data retention and ensure that personal data is not kept longer than necessary for the specified purpose.  Consider implementing a data retention policy that outlines the criteria for determining retention periods.

non_compliant.section: We will perpetually delete, destroy or anonymously dispose the personal data after the expiration of above retention period.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
non_compliant.amend: While anonymization is a valid data processing method, "perpetual" deletion might not always be feasible.  Clarify the methods used for data deletion and ensure they align with GDPR requirements.

non_compliant.section: We are not responsible for any content, products or services offered on any third-party websites. Links to third-party websites are provided for your convenience only. This Privacy Policy will not apply to any personal data that you provide to, or that is collected by, any third-party website operator. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of those other websites.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Accountability and responsibility for onward transfers
non_compliant.amend: While not directly non-compliant, this section raises concerns about accountability for data shared with third parties.  Provide more specific information about data sharing practices with third parties, including the types of data shared and the safeguards in place to protect personal data.

non_compliant.section: If there¡¦s other legal basis of the processing, we may continue to process your personal data .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing
non_compliant.amend: Clearly state the legal basis for processing personal data, specifying the specific legal ground for each processing purpose. If relying on legitimate interest, conduct and document a Legitimate Interest Assessment (LIA).

non_compliant.section: (7) Under the reasonable and practicable premise, transfer your personal data to the information controller of designated third party in an usable or machine-readable form .
non_compliant.legal provisions: General principle for transfers
non_compliant.amend: Specify the third parties involved, the countries of transfer, and the safeguards implemented to ensure adequate data protection (e.g., adequacy decisions, Standard Contractual Clauses).

non_compliant.section: (1) Since Wiwynn is a multinational enterprise, there may be cross-border transmission and use of personal data between subsidiaries in different countries . Within the scope of not exceeding the original purpose of collecting, processing and using personal data and complying with the Policy, we will comply with this policy and the privacy and personal data protection laws and regulations applicable to the transmission area .
non_compliant.legal provisions: General principle for transfers, Transfers on the basis of an adequacy decision
non_compliant.amend: Provide specific information about the international data transfers, including the countries involved and the safeguards in place. Ensure compliance with Chapter V of the GDPR.

non_compliant.section: (1) We have incorporated privacy rights and personal data protection into the scope of internal control and risk management of the enterprise, and has formulated the "WYHQ Internal Control System" as well as various internal control cycle operation rules to carry out related operations to reduce potential risks and impacts .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Security of processing
non_compliant.amend: Detail the specific technical and organizational measures implemented to ensure data security, aligning with the principles of 'data protection by design and by default' (Article 25).

non_compliant.section: (2) We adopt the zero-tolerance policy for privacy protection . If any employee violates the Policy, he or she will be punished in accordance with our relevant regulations and, depending on the severity of the case, we will seek compensation or pursue legal action in accordance with the law .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Security of processing
non_compliant.amend: Focus on proactive measures to prevent breaches rather than solely on punitive actions after a violation.

non_compliant.section: (3) In order to ensure the implementation of the privacy protection system, the legal department is responsible for the formulation of the relevant system, and the audit department will examine the implementation status of the relevant mechanism .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Responsibility of the controller, Security of processing
non_compliant.amend: Clearly outline the roles and responsibilities related to data protection within the organization, including the designation of a Data Protection Officer (DPO) if required under Article 37.

non_compliant.section: (4) We conduct annual internal audits to verify that the measures of personal data protection and related procedures comply with relevant laws and regulations and management systems .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Responsibility of the controller, Security of processing
non_compliant.amend: Demonstrate ongoing monitoring and review of data processing activities and security measures, not just annual audits.

non_compliant.section: (5) Conduct regular training on privacy protection for all employees and keep training records .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Security of processing
non_compliant.amend: Provide details about the content and frequency of the training program, ensuring it covers GDPR principles and relevant data protection practices.

non_compliant.section: (1) We collect your personal data in several ways . Most of the personal data we receive comes to us voluntarily from you who are interested in obtaining products and services from us or is collected by using technology . As you visit our website, our information technology (IT) systems may also collect passive information, including your Internet Protocol (IP) address, browser type, and operating system .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data
non_compliant.amend: Provide specific details about the personal data collected, the purpose of processing for each data category, and the legal basis for processing (e.g., consent, contract, legal obligation). Ensure transparency and clarity for users.

non_compliant.section: We also use cookies to gather information on the date and time of your visit.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation - Data must be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes. Lawfulness of processing - Processing should be lawful, fair and transparent to the data subject.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the purpose of gathering date and time information and the legal basis for processing this data. Provide users with a clear and concise way to opt-out of such data collection if it's not essential for the service.

non_compliant.section: You agree that Wiwynn may in its sole discretion and without prior notice, terminate your access to the Website and/or block your future access to the Website if we determine that you have violated these Terms of Use.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to data portability
non_compliant.amend: Wiwynn should provide users with the right to receive their personal data in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format, and to transmit those data to another controller without hindrance from Wiwynn, where technically feasible.

non_compliant.section: You also agree that any violation by you of these Terms of Use will constitute an unlawful and unfair business practice, and will cause irreparable harm to Wiwynn, for which monetary damages would be inadequate, and you consent to Wiwynn obtaining any injunctive or equitable relief that Wiwynn deems necessary or appropriate in such circumstances.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to an effective judicial remedy against a supervisory authority
non_compliant.amend: Users have the right to an effective judicial remedy against legally binding decisions of a supervisory authority, as well as against a controller or processor.

non_compliant.section: Except where prohibited by law, in no event shall Wiwynn be liable for any direct, special, indirect, or consequential damages or any damages whatsoever, including loss of profits or data, whether in an action in contract or tort, in connection with the use or performance of this information, even if Wiwynn has been advised of the possibility of such damages.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to compensation and liability
non_compliant.amend: Wiwynn should be liable for material or non-material damage resulting from infringement of the GDPR.

non_compliant.section: These Terms of Use and any separate agreements whereby we provide you Services shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Taiwan R.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Territorial scope
non_compliant.amend: While the GDPR does not explicitly prohibit choosing the law of a non-EU country, it emphasizes that the GDPR applies to the processing of personal data of data subjects in the EU, regardless of whether the processing takes place in the EU.  Consider clarifying the application of the GDPR alongside Taiwanese law.

non_compliant.section: The persistent or perpetual cookies are contained in your device until you delete them manually or it reaches to the expiration date you set up for retention period.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Storage limitation - Data shall be kept in a form which permits identification of data subjects for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which the personal data are processed
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the specific purposes for using persistent cookies and ensure their retention period is limited to what is strictly necessary for those purposes. Provide clear and comprehensive information about cookie usage and consent mechanisms.
